findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations exposes the parties to significant financial risk in case of breaches or legal disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid can leave parties vulnerable to greater losses, especially in cases of severe breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights limits oversight and may increase risk of non-compliance with confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes over ownership and use of shared ideas or inventions.
Requiring the Receiving Party to pay attorneys' fees can create an imbalance and discourage enforcement of the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall pay all attorneys' fees and costs incurred by the Disclosing Party in enforcing this Agreement.
